verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rejoice evermore For this is the will of God In Christ Jesus concerning you. Pray without ceasing In everything give thanks Quench not the Holy Spirit{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Despise not prophesying For this is the will of God In Christ Jesus concerning you. Examine all things carefully Hold fast that which is good Abstain from every evil.{/lang-eng}
